key_metrics.name: Product Innovation Platforms
key_metrics.context: New products launched across 13 platforms including bags, cookware, and shaker bottles

key_metrics.name: Direct-to-Consumer Mix
key_metrics.context: Percentage of revenue from direct-to-consumer channel

key_metrics.name: International Revenue Mix
key_metrics.context: International sales grew 14% while US sales declined 1%

other: Adjusted operating income as a percentage of adjusted sales between 14.0% and 14.5%
Adjusted net income per diluted share between $2.38 and $2.49

guidance.commentary: Management expresses confidence in delivering strong holiday and Q4 performance, reaffirming full-year top and bottom-line guidance. Third quarter momentum positions company well for year-end targets.

acquisitions.name: Helimix branded shaker bottle
acquisitions.details: Acquired for $38.0 million in cash to enhance product offerings
acquisitions.impact: Expected to expand product portfolio and drive growth

product_launches.details: Includes bags, cookware, and shaker bottles
product_launches.impact: Driving growth across Drinkware and Coolers & Equipment segments

initiatives.progress: On track to diversify manufacturing footprint by year-end

risks.details: 320 basis point unfavorable impact on gross margin
risks.mitigation: Selective price increases and supply chain transformation

key_positives: Revenue growth of 2% to $487.8 million despite challenging environment
Strong international growth of 14% demonstrating global expansion success
Coolers & Equipment segment grew 12% driven by soft coolers and bags performance
Successful Helimix acquisition for $38 million expanding product portfolio
Strong cash position of $164.5 million with positive free cash flow of $50.1 million
Increased share repurchase program to $300 million showing capital allocation confidence
key_concerns: Net income declined 30% year-over-year to $39.4 million
US market sales declined 1% showing domestic market pressure
Drinkware segment decreased 4% due to US region decline
Tariff costs created 320 basis point headwind on gross margin
Operating margin compressed to 11.1% from higher levels

notable_quotes.speaker: Matt Reintjes, President and CEO
notable_quotes.quote: Our third quarter results continue to show the strength of YETI and the positive momentum of our long-term growth strategy.

highlights.investment_thesis: YETI demonstrates resilient brand strength with revenue growth and international expansion momentum, though faces margin pressure from tariffs and domestic market headwinds. Strategic acquisitions and product innovation position the company for long-term growth despite near-term profitability challenges.

metadata.notes: Comprehensive financial and operational data available. Missing EBITDA figures and some operational metrics like employee count. Strong strategic and qualitative information provided.
